probability

in order to draw conclusions as to how
efficient a player is at shooting over

are compared with the number of goals he
scored from them
for example robert lewandowski's eight
shots in the game against borussia
monchengladbach in

in reality he scored three goals meaning
the striker exceeded his theoretical

the passing profile provides a deep
insight into the passing game of an

into account factors such as main
direction pass length past difficulty
and completion rate
there are eight different name

rate passes with the success probability

are categorized as difficult the
